text: Goe guu noho i Eden, di hadagee a God, goe gu ulu nia hagadilinga mee e logo: nia hadu hagalabagau go nia ‘ruby’, ‘diamond’, ‘topaz’, ‘beryl’, ‘onyx’, ‘jasper’, ‘sapphire’, ‘emerald’, mono hadu ‘garnet’. Goe guu hai doo hau goolo dela ne hai go digaula adu gi di goe i di laangi dela ne hai goe.
